response.overview: Brandon is a rising star in the podcast world. When he receives an on-air call from Paulette, a local barista, he soon learns that success comes at a price, as Paulette works to interject herself into a every aspect of his life, and sabotaging his success in the process in her ultimate goal to be his number one in all aspects of his life.
response.tagline: A Tall Cup of Revenge with no Sugar
response.title: The Barista
